body.name: BOBLOV W1 1080P 64GB Body Camera, Wearable Camera Support 90 Minutes with Loop Recording, Easy to Use and Take for Traveling, Walking, Law Enforcement and Outdoors Activities
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 23 mins
features: 【1080P Body Camera & Loop Recording】BOBLOV W1 Body Camera records videos in stunning 1080P resolution, equipped with a loop recording function, when the memory is insufficient, old files are automatically overwritten, so there is no need to worry about losing evidence.

【Small Size& Expandable Memory Card】The W1 Camcorder has slender figure, weighing only 35 grams and measuring 2.95 x 1 x 0.63 inches that fit nicely in a pocket. For your convenience, a 64GB memory card is included. You donot have to worry about insufficient memory. You can record files for easy viewing later on the computure side.

【Professional-Grade Components】The BOBLOV W1 body camera boasts a high-specification body camera equipped with a So-ny sensor, typically reserved for professional cameras and dash cameras. This ensures exceptional video quality with unmatched sharpness and clarity, eliminating any concerns about pixelation.

【One-button Operation】W1 is different from other devices, with side sliding buttons and concise instructions, making recording easy. It is also equipped with an indicator light to easily determine the recording status. From law enforcement officers to the elderly to young people, there is no need to learn how to operate, and it is easy and quick to get started.

【What in the Box】1*W1 Body Camera, 1*User Manual, 1*USB Cable. At the same time, one-month replacement and two-year warranty are provided. If you have any concerns or questions, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: W1 Mini Body Camera 1080P HD Resolution Chipset: Novatel 96672Sensor: Sony IMX307Video Resolution: 1080P+, 30fpsLoop Recording: YesVideo Format: H.264, MP4Photo Format: JPGNight Vision: NOStorage: Support TF cards up to 128G(This link is 64GB memory)Battery: Built-in 550mAh, video recording for about 110 minutes 1,True 1080P: Novatek 96672 chipset+Sony IMX307 optical sensor, faster imaging processing speed and clear video shooting than other small body cameras 2, Adopts external storage, supports a TF card up to 128GB.(Card not included) 3, Built-in 550mAh battery, supports 110 minutes video recording time,support recording while charging 4, Muti modes: support video/audio/photo/audio+video Mode, meets your different requirements 5, Double clips and push button design, easier to wear and operate.Suitable for a variety of scenarios: pets recording, outdoor sports, bike cycling, meeting, lecture, hiking, evidence collection etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BOBLOV W1 1080P 64GB Body Camera with HD Sharp Quality ·Professional Sony 307 Lens ·True 1080P ·Time Stamp ·External Memory ·Recording Time ·Loop Recording

Sony IMX 307 Sensor and Novatek chip Usually, Novatek chipset and sony sensor are used for professional cameras, dash cameras etc. BOBLOV W1 adopts Novatek 96672 chipset and Sony IMX307 optical sensor, provides a video resolution up to 1296P. Video+Audio+Photoes W1 support video recording. audio, take photoes, it has voice when video recordings as well. Loop Recording Provide 64GB memory card. When the memory is full, it will be loop recording supported.

Time&Date Stamp Setting W1 has no time stamp in default but can set time stamp with tool. You can set it as your needed How to set up the time and date? Please download the tool via our official website, search"Boblov. com"

Operation Steps 1. Insert a TF Card 2. Push the Off/ON Button to "On" 3. Push the Button to Video or Audio 4. Hook the camera with computer by USB 5. Watch the videos file directly 6. Support Recording While charging, record video for a long time.
